displayName.japanese: マスターフォトグラファー

description.brazilian: Capture as fotos perfeitas e documente a verdade através da sua lente.
description.english: Capture the perfect shots and document the truth through your lens.
description.french: Capture les clichés parfaits et documente la vérité à travers ton objectif.
description.german: Halte die perfekten Aufnahmen fest und dokumentiere die Wahrheit durch dein Objektiv.
description.japanese: 完璧な一枚を捉え、レンズを通して真実を記録せよ。
description.russian: Сделай идеальные снимки и задокументируй правду через объектив.
description.schinese: 捕捉完美瞬间，用镜头记录真相。
description.turkish: Mükemmel kareleri yakala ve gerçeği objektifinle belge­le.

description.brazilian: Junte as pistas e resolva o que outros não conseguem perceber.
description.english: Piece together the clues and solve what others fail to notice.
description.french: Assemble les indices et résous ce que les autres ne remarquent pas.
description.german: Setze die Hinweise zusammen und löse, was andere nicht bemerken.
description.japanese: 手がかりをつなぎ合わせ、他の者が見落とす真実を解き明かせ。
description.russian: Собери улики воедино и раскрой то, что другие не замечают.
description.schinese: 拼凑线索，解开他人未曾察觉的谜题。
description.turkish: İpuçlarını birleştir ve başkalarının fark edemediklerini çöz.

description.brazilian: Para aqueles que vasculham cada canto para descobrir tudo.
description.english: For those who scour every corner to discover everything.
description.french: Pour ceux qui fouillent chaque recoin afin de tout découvrir.
description.german: Für diejenigen, die jede Ecke durchkämmen, um alles zu entdecken.
description.japanese: すべてを発見するために、あらゆる場所をくまなく探し尽くす者へ。
description.russian: Для тех, кто обыскивает каждый уголок, чтобы открыть всё.
description.schinese: 献给那些搜遍每个角落、发现一切的人。
description.turkish: Her şeyi keşfetmek için her köşeyi didik didik edenler için.

displayName.japanese: 恐れ知らずのジャーナリスト

description.brazilian: Avance sem hesitar e persiga a história, não importa o perigo.
description.english: Move forward without hesitation and chase the story no matter the danger.
description.french: Avance sans hésiter et poursuis l’histoire, peu importe le danger.
description.german: Geh ohne Zögern voran und jage der Geschichte nach, egal wie groß die Gefahr ist.
description.japanese: 危険を顧みず、ためらうことなく前へ進み、真実を追い続けろ。
description.russian: Иди вперёд без колебаний и преследуй историю, несмотря на опасность.
description.schinese: 无所畏惧地前进，不论多么危险，都要追寻真相。
description.turkish: Tehlike ne olursa olsun tereddüt etmeden ilerle ve hikâyenin peşinden git.
